0.2.0.description: A simple switcher to switch "JavaScript Support" for ide-typescript

readme:
# Flow TS switcher

This is a simple switcher to switch `Enable JavaScript Support` for `ide-typescript` package.

The reason why I make this package is I need JavaScript support from `ide-typescript` often. But sometimes, I would use Flow, which has conflicts with `ide-typescript`. (Such as type annotations)

No key shortcuts. Just menu item.
